xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 10 Dassanenapahātabbahetukattika » 10.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra » 10.5.1 Paccayānuloma » 10.5.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Adhipatyādi
Dassanenapahātabbahetukattika
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Adhipatyādi
67.
1251Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—  dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhā. (1)
1252Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho…  ekaṃ.
1253Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayā—  nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhā; anantarapaccayā…  samanantarapaccayā.
<< Ārammaṇaup Sahajātādi >>
